'''''Vinyar Tengwar 32''''' is the thirty-second issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|31|33}}

==Contents==
* Cover: The ''Attolma'' Manuscript — [[Carl F. Hostetter]]
* E.L.F. News

* "''Attolma'' (The Lord's Prayer in Quenya)" — Patrick H. Wynne and Carl F. Hostetter
* "Words and Devices: There are Fairies at the Bottom of our Garden!" (column) — Patrick H. Wynne and Carl F. Hostetter
* "Transitions in Translations: Czech Runes" (column) — Arden R. Smith
